instruction:
Given the following job description, create a tailored resume:

Job Title: AI Data Scientist Intern

Job Description:
YOU MUST BE BILINGUAL FOR THIS POSITION - SEEKING ENGLISH & SPANISH SPEAKERS
We are looking for an enthusiastic data scientist to join our company and help us scale YouROK and plan for the next round of product enhancements.
Someone who has performed healthcare analytics is best suited for this role. Working with direct supervision you will be responsible for optimizing our sentiment analysis algorithms accurately scoring users to provide a reliable Am I OK index score, YouROK’s proprietary algorithm.  Additionally, we need someone who can extrapolate our current algorithm for the English language and train it on Spanish teen jargon to facilitate introducing our Spanish version.
As a data scientist intern, you will work directly with the founder and CEO, Patrina Mack (https://www.linkedin.com/in/patrinamack/), recognized as a Woman of Influence in 2017 by the San Jose Business Journal and a noted Silicon Valley expert in the field of product management. You will be working toward a degree in Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning with additional skills in data- and modeling-heavy discipline (e.g. statistics, computer science, economics, econometrics, linguistics, neuroscience, biostatistics, data visualization, etc.)

Please create a tailored resume that highlights relevant skills and experience for this position.
output:
